thread.title: Cheap robots may shift car making from China to U.S.: Magna CEO - West Australian
thread.title_full: Cheap robots may shift car making from China to U.S.: Magna CEO - West Australian - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: West Australian
title: Cheap robots may shift car making from China to U.S.: Magna CEO - West Australian
text:
The falling cost of intelligent robots may help repatriate some car manufacturing work away from low-cost locations like China back to factories in Germany and North America, Donald Walker, Chief Executive of auto supplier Magna told Reuters. Rising wages in China and the cost of importing heavy components like electric car batteries into Europe may lead established car makers to introduce more highly efficient automated manufacturing closer to home, Walker told Reuters in an interview at the Frankfurt auto show.
 West Australian.
